net.proteusframework.ui.search

Interface SearchConstraint

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PropertyConstraint
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPropertyConstraint, ComboBoxConstraint, DateConstraint, FixedSearchConstraint, SimpleConstraint

    public interface SearchConstraint
extends Cloneable
    Represents a search constraint.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCriteria(QLBuilder builder, Component constraintComponent)
      Add criteria for this constraint.
      SearchConstraint clone()
      Creates a copy of this constraint.
      byte[] encodeValueForPersistence(Component constraintComponent)
      Encode the value currently represented by the constraint component for persistence.
      Component getConstraintComponent()
      Get the constraint component.
      net.proteusframework.core.locale.TextSource getLabel()
      Get the label for the constraint.
      String getName()
      Get the unique name of the search constraint.
      void reset(Component constraintComponent)
      Reset the constraint component to its default state.
      void restoreValueForPersistence(Component constraintComponent, byte[] encodedValue)
      Restore a previously persisted value.

    • Method Detail

      • addCriteria

        void addCriteria(QLBuilder builder,
               @Nullable
               Component constraintComponent)
        Add criteria for this constraint.
        Parameters:
        builder - the builder.
        constraintComponent - the component or null. Component parameter is the same as returned from getConstraintComponent().

      • clone

        SearchConstraint clone()
        Creates a copy of this constraint.
        Returns:
        the copy.

      • encodeValueForPersistence

        byte[] encodeValueForPersistence(Component constraintComponent)
        Encode the value currently represented by the constraint component for persistence.
        Parameters:
        constraintComponent - the constraint component returned from getConstraintComponent().
        Returns:
        the encoded value or null if the search constraint doesn't support persistence. NULL values must be encoded.

      • getConstraintComponent

        Component getConstraintComponent()
        Get the constraint component. Typically a Field or ComboBox.
        Returns:
        the component or null.

      • getLabel

        net.proteusframework.core.locale.TextSource getLabel()
        Get the label for the constraint.
        Returns:
        the label. This can be null, if the implementor requires customization of the constraint appearance. In that case, the getConstraintComponent() should include the label.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Get the unique name of the search constraint.
        Returns:
        the unique name. May be null.

      • reset

        void reset(Component constraintComponent)
        Reset the constraint component to its default state.
        Parameters:
        constraintComponent - the constraint component returned from getConstraintComponent().

      • restoreValueForPersistence

        void restoreValueForPersistence(Component constraintComponent,
                              byte[] encodedValue)
        Restore a previously persisted value.
        Parameters:
        constraintComponent - the constraint component returned from getConstraintComponent().
        encodedValue - the value returned from encodeValueForPersistence(Component).
